function UpdateData()

    local RepairMode = false

    if FirstRun == true then RepairMode = true end

    local idforarrow = nil
    local vars = nil
    local aid = nil

    for key, screen in pairs(screens) do -- checking screens output for action triggers

        if Debug == true then 
            start = system.getArkTime()
        end


        if databank.hasKey(screen.id) == nil then            
            unit.exit() -- if databank is not rendered anymore (too far) and crashes script
        elseif databank.hasKey(screen.id) == 0 then
            if Debug == true then system.print("Databank index key not found, setting default value") end
            databank.setStringValue(screen.id,1)
        end

        local o = json.decode(screen.getScriptOutput())

        if  type(o) == 'table' then
            if o.ThemeSelection[1] ~= nil then
                if comparetables(json.decode(databank.getStringValue("theme")), o.ThemeSelection) == false then
                    databank.setStringValue("theme", json.encode(o.ThemeSelection))
                end
            end

            if o.Index ~= nil then o = o.Index end

        elseif type(o) == 'string' then
            if string.find(o, ",") then -- if comma found in output
                for screenindex, value in (o):gmatch "(%w+)%s*,%s*(%w+)" do
                    o = screenindex
                    aid = value
                    if tonumber(o) == 52 then
                        core.forceUndock(aid)
                        if Debug == true then system.print("undocking "..aid) end
                    elseif tonumber(o) == 62 then
                        core.forceDeboard(aid)
                        if Debug == true then system.print("unboarding "..aid) end
                    end
                end
            end
        end

        if o ~= '' and o ~= nil then  -- if output not empty
            if tonumber(o) ~= tonumber(databank.getStringValue(screen.id)) then -- checking if value already exists in DB
                databank.setStringValue(screen.id, o)
                if Debug == true then system.print("writing to databank screenId: "..screen.id.." index: "..o) end
            end
        end     

        if tonumber(o) == 2 then 
            if Debug == true then system.print("entering repair mode") end
            RepairMode = true
            idforarrow = aid       
        end
end
        ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        -- setting up variables for screens


        local m = json.decode(databank.getStringValue("theme"))

        vars = [[
        local version = ]]..version..[[        
        local debug = ]]..tostring(Debug)..[[
        local SavedTheme = {]]..m[1]..[[,]]..m[2]..[[,]]..m[3]..[[,]]..m[4]..[[,]]..m[5]..[[,]]..m[6]..[[,]]..m[7]..[[,]]..m[8]..[[}
        local Custom_Layout = {]]..Custom_Layout[1]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[2]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[3]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[4]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[5]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[6]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[7]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[8]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[9]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[10]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[11]..[[,]]..Custom_Layout[12]..[[}
        ]]..GetHubData(Hubs,hubs)..[[
        ]]..GetTankData(tanks)..[[
        ]]..GetDamagedData(RepairMode,idforarrow)..[[
        ]]..GetDockedData()..[[
        ]]..GetBoardedData()..[[
        local ShipName = "]]..construct.getName()..[[" 
        local ShipMass = ]]..math.floor(construct.getMass())..[[ 
        ]]

        if Debug == true then
            duration = (system.getArkTime() - start)*1000
            duration = math.floor((duration) * 100) / 100
            -- system.print(duration)
            debug = "local Duration = "..duration
        else
            debug = ""
        end
    
    
    for key, screen in pairs(screens) do -- now updating screens
        screen.setScriptInput(system.getArkTime())
        if vars ~= OldContent[screen.id] then
            screen.setRenderScript(debug.. " local SavedIndex="..databank.getStringValue(screen.id).." local ScreenId="..screen.id..'\n'..vars ..'\n'.. screenContent)
            if Debug == true then system.print("updating screen "..screen.id) end
            OldContent[screen.id] = vars            
        end
        FirstRun = false

end

function drawRadialGauge(X,Y,Size,Current,Max,Text,TankType)
    local a1=math.floor(100/Max*Current).."%" -- percent
    local d=math.pi/180
    local W=math.ceil(Current/Max*100)
    local ab=100
    local ac,ad=Size*math.cos(0),Size*math.sin(0)
    local ae,af=Size*math.cos(360/ab*1*d),Size*math.sin(360/ab*1*d)
    for ag=1,ab,1 do
        local ac,ad=X+Size*math.cos((360/ab*(ag-1)+-90)*d),Y+Size*math.sin((360/ab*(ag-1)+-90)*d)
        local ae,af=X+Size*math.cos((360/ab*ag+-90)*d),Y+Size*math.sin((360/ab*ag+-90)*d)
        if ag<W or ag==W then
            setNextFillColor(E,color1.r,color1.g,color1.b,1)
        else 
            setNextFillColor(E,0,0,0,1)
        end
        addTriangle(E,X,Y,ac,ad,ae,af)
    end
    setNextFillColor(F,0.137,0.122,0.125,1)
    addCircle(F,X,Y,Size/1.255)

    if type(TankType) == 'string' then

        if string.match(TankType, "Atmospheric") then
            setNextFillColor(H,71/255,144/255,179/255,1) 
        elseif string.match(TankType, "Space") then
            setNextFillColor(H,1,0.1,0.1,1)

        elseif string.match(TankType, "Rocket") then
            setNextFillColor(H,0.1,1,0.1,1)

        end
        addBox(H,X-Size/4,Y+ry*0.02,Size/2,4) 
    end

    setNextFillColor(H, fontColor.r, fontColor.g, fontColor.b, 1)   
    setNextTextAlign(H,AlignH_Center,AlignV_Bottom)
    addText(H,BiggerFont,a1,X+(Size/15),Y+ry*0.01) -- centered percent
    setNextTextAlign(H,AlignH_Center,AlignV_Bottom)
    setNextFillColor(H, fontColor.r, fontColor.g, fontColor.b, 1)   
    addText(H,SmallestFont,Text,X,Y+Size*1.6)
end
